column4: Do they have ubuntu7.04 server fixed yet so it actually installs the LAMP server listed in option 2 of its install screen?
Can anyone say that the LAMP server actually installs? It didn't last time I tried it, and someone said there was a bug in the installation disc. Is it fixed?
if it doesnt, you can always just install LAMP afterwards.  But I haven't tried it ersonally.  still on dapper.
it is.  For the most part, this page walks you through it: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/ApacheMySQLPHP
